lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because:
I feel it is the responsibility of people who are financially able to help those who need help--
both monetarily and emotionally
lenders.occupational_info: I worked with children who had special learning problems.  I have taught many children to read and do basic arithmetic.  Presently I do a lot of volunteering.

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: The world needs positive energy.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is collecting individual objects to create a whole.  My art shows offer a singular gift of beauty, sets of objects from a wordwide talent pool. Kiva allows me another way to be part of something bigger than myself. Future loans are dedicated to my little dog Muffy, who at almost 17 years of age, lost her battle with kidney disease on Jan. 14, 2010. She was a loving child who shared her life and love with me without question.

lenders.name: Catherine
lenders.loan_because: I want to share the hope of a prosperous tomorrow.
lenders.occupational_info: I write about technical subjects for big companies who wish to get business from the U.S. government

lenders.name: Will

lenders.name: Devi
lenders.loan_because: I love microfinance. I worked with a fantastic microfinance organization in India a few years ago, and want to stay involved in the movement while I focus on other things for a while.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: it is so easy to do and it helps out those that need a hand-up!

lenders.occupational_info: I work for a company that invents medicines.  I visit doctors and explain how the medicines work and how to correctly use them.

lenders.name: Seamus
lenders.loan_because: I work a pretty bad job. It's pretty much the standard all other bad jobs are compared to. But even as bad as I think I have it, there are people in some of these countries that would kill to get a job with twice the workload and half the pay. So I figure, hey, why not help out? I don't feel I'm obligated to, or that someone who doesn't is a bad person, I just think it's a nice thing to do, yea?
lenders.occupational_info: I scrub the bathrooms, mop the floors, and pick up trash. Pretty exciting, isn't it?

lenders.name: John

lenders.name: Gian
lenders.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Social Media, Collaboration, Knowledge Management, Learning & Development

lenders.name: Kate

lenders.name: Vivek
lenders.loan_because: I like to see empowerment in people's lives. I think its the right thing to do. I can afford it. These people want to work, they don't want to be on the dole. lenders.occupational_info: Providing liquidity by spreading the risk of mortgages from banks to pension funds, money managers, insurance companies and hedge funds.

lenders.occupational_info: I help make movies and TV shows. I also take photographs.

lenders.name: Edward Bos
lenders.loan_because: Starting your own business is admirable, taking charge and responsibility of you own life. It's often difficult and should be supported all around the world. You starters have my respect!
lenders.occupational_info: Helping starting entrepreneurs with starting there business by coaching, motivate and advise them to start  the best way possible and to achieve realistic goals and continuity.

lenders.name: Yassir
lenders.loan_because: This is an extremely  powerful way to make a significant difference in the lives of poor people and to help them lift themselves out of poverty. A small investment by us,  will yield tremendous long-term returns to them.
lenders.occupational_info: Communications for an Int'l non-profit that is breeding crops that are richer in  nutrients(vitamin A, zinc, iron) to improve health of the poor. Also a web-writer. If you like plants check out my websites www.houseplantsnow.com or argusorchids.net

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: If we can, we should.
lenders.occupational_info: I write for money.

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I can.  I am grateful for what I have, and want to be an entrepreneur myself one day.

lenders.name: Amy

We have been blessed by the Lord so we can now bless others with 100 percent of the money we make from this band.
lenders.occupational_info: We write music, we play concerts, we get money from playing concerts, from fans, and from selling merchandise.  100 percent of that money  is going to Kiva microloans.

lenders.loan_because: I can

I honor hard working individuals.

lenders.occupational_info: Responsible to collect money  from clients who buy advertising on my company's TV stations.

lenders.name: Jette Andreassen
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a different

lenders.occupational_info: I manage a treatment program for people with gambling problems.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: there is nothing better than helping someone improve their current position. We take so much for granted in this country, including the easy access to low interest loans. Why not give someone the chance to expand their business and make their lives just a little easier?

My mission is that 
to organize the world's information of food and agriculture and make it universally  usable and no world of starvation.

lenders.name: Martin
lenders.occupational_info: I get people youtube views for their videos.

lenders.name: Jeff Green
lenders.loan_because: I wish to do my part in helping others help themselves.  If each person gave according to their ability, we could change the world.  The gifts we give to others need not be monetary.  Maybe all you can give away today is an uncertain, but well defined smile.  Give that.  Tomorrow, maybe you'll give away hugs.  In no time at all, you'll be slinging bling-bling to unsuspecting passersby in a developing nation.  (Be sure to maintain a genuine sense of charity that doesn't involve too much of your ego. Give because you know in your heart that improves happiness for everyone, not just yourself.)  So we each should give, no matter what, according to our abilities.  Consider this, if a rich man gave you a plate of tomatoes from his royal gardens, and then a poor man offered you a plate of tomatoes he grew with his own hands, and tomatoes were not so plentiful this year due to rains.  Who gave you the most meaningful gift, the Nobleman or the Poor man?  Same tomatoes...could it be that one of the gifts had tremendously greater value than the other?
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the State of Oklahoma helping to ensure that our water supply is clean and readily available for use tomorrow and also many years down the road.

lenders.name: Taylor
lenders.loan_because: It will help others
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a business student at a large university

lenders.name: Amit
lenders.loan_because: I can............Giving someone an opportunity is better than charity
lenders.occupational_info: Fighting the MAN!!!

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I have a desire to make the world a better place and to help women achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I have been a clerical worker for 40 years.  I recently retired and now enjoy doing volunteer work and growing vegetables for our meals.

lenders.name: shane
lenders.loan_because: to give someone a go

lenders.name: The Butler Five
lenders.loan_because: We loan becuase we admire the determined entrepreneurs across the globe.

lenders.name: Ruben
lenders.loan_because: I believe every action, no matter how modest, can make a big difference.

lenders.loan_because: My needs personal needs are satisfied, all i am left with are 'wants' so try and fulfill others essential needs, by giving them the gift of opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I wash dishes for money, superficially a pretty unimportant job, but with the money earned from it, i gain satisfaction with the thought that i can help others,

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.loan_because: My parents are teaching me how lucky I am to have so many toys.  I save up my pocket money and give some away to people who don't have as many things as me.
lenders.occupational_info: I am kinder.

lenders.name: Fabienne
lenders.loan_because: I'm 15 years old, and I've watched people let others struggle all my life, which has't been very long. It tears my heart out to see people in need, and people who have the ability to give just walk right by like they've seen nothing. It's time for me to give back to the world, I wan't to help, I wan't to be a part of team KIVA, erasing poverty one person at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I attend an Art school for dance and poetry.

lenders.name: Sabine
lenders.loan_because: It was a birthday gift from a friend and this is a real good thing!  Much better than stuff I don't need and may be it will be a little piece of help for people who are fighting for surviving.

lenders.name: Carl-Johan
lenders.loan_because: It feels good!

lenders.name: Andrea
lenders.loan_because: ...the best way to help people is to help them support themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I translate books, mostly non-fiction

lenders.name: Sarah
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: My sister loaned me some money when I was twelve years old. We went together to Sears and found some white fabric with red strawberries on sale and we bought some red rickrack too. We went home and I made several aprons. I went from house to house in the neighborhood selling the aprons explaining I was earning money for summer camp. I sold out the first batch and had to go back for more fabric. I was able to pay half my way to summer camp (my parents paid the other half) and pay my sister back. Small loans work. My sister helped me when I needed it. Kiva is an opportunity for me to help somebody as my sister helped me.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I was very fortunate to be born in a part of the world where things are more easily available.  I want to help make a difference for those people who are as hard working but who just need a little help to get things off the ground.

lenders.name: Hollito
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a good way for "direct" help.
lenders.occupational_info: Mechanical engineering for waste sorting and treatment plants

lenders.name: Cordelia
lenders.loan_because: I think micro-loans are a great idea!

lenders.name: Thorsten
lenders.occupation: Businessman for audio- & visual media, musician
lenders.loan_because:
I am enthusiastic about KIVA!
For me it's provide an excellent chance to bring the money direct to the people and make the "world" a little bit better and more social by individual initiative :)

lenders.name: Chris and Stefanie
lenders.loan_because: Donating this way ensures that money falls into the hands of the people who need it the most.
lenders.occupational_info: Chris works for a large mortgage administration company and ensures mortgages are being administered in accordance to state and federal law.  Stefanie teaches aerobics, weightlifting, yoga, Pilates, and cycling for exercise in gyms throughout Houston.   In our leisure time, we both love to read and travel.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: these people need our help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the human resources department of a microbrewery.  Primarily, I assist our employees with health and retirement benefits, manage the company's safety programs and do a lot of compensation analysis and project work for the management teams.

lenders.name: Marty
lenders.loan_because: I love to see people succeed in business and it makes me feel good!

lenders.name: Milena
lenders.loan_because: what goes around comes around
lenders.occupational_info: an incredible opportunty I have been given

lenders.name: Mack Family
lenders.loan_because: We are business owners ourselves and know how important it is to have business financing available. Through Kiva we have an opportunity to impact businesses and lives all around the world.

lenders.name: Rosalie
lenders.loan_because: The entrepreneurs on Kiva are working hard and I am happy to help. I know I am lucky to have everything that I have and this is a great way to share.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the fund raising office of the visual and performing arts University I graduated from. I ask foundations to give us money to support our students.

lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate to pursue my own business activities and interests and would like to help others do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working towards my masters of business administration degree at a school in Boston.

lenders.loan_because:
hello gina ceroni I'm 22 years old and my daughter is ell Antonio de 2 añitos this year he returned to study theater in Intituto professional aiep in which I am behind in dues to continue estuudiando and give a better future for my daughter and my need 1350 dollars to pay arrears through my rut is to enable them 16377710k comprovar anything thanks

hola soy gina ceroni tengo 22 años y ell es mi hija antonia de 2 añitos este año he vuelto a estudiar teatro en el intituto profesional aiep en el cual me encuentro atrasada en cuotas para seguir estuudiando y darle un fututo mejor a mi y a mi hija necesito 1350 dolares para pagar las cuotas atrasadas gracias mi rut es 16377710k para que puedan comprovar cualquier cosa gracias
lenders.occupational_info:
work in a callcenter at this time but the money is to fund my studies of what theater is my passion which I love I think there is much need to deliver love to make people feel emotions to hemanos beings not to forget about us

trabajo en un callcenter en este momento pero el dinero es para financiar mis estudios de teatro lo cual es mi pasion me encanta creo que hay mucha necesidad de entregar amor a la gente hacer sentir emociones a los seres hemanos para que no olvidemos quienes somos

lenders.name: Prima Equity Partners
lenders.loan_because: Through the returns of our investments we are able to make a positive change on the world around us.
lenders.occupational_info: Prima Equity Partners is a private equity firm that invests globally and when we exit investments we take a portion of our proceeds and donate to great organizations like Kiva.

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: There can be no peace in a world where poverty is allowed to persist, so all of us making a small difference....the drop in the bucket....will end up filling the bucket eventually.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with people to help them carry out their dreams & aspirations when it comes to one of the things that is so important to all of us...our homes. I'm very aware of how blessed we all are in our part of this world & how great the disparity is between us & most of the world's population. I also spend a great deal of time & energy in trying to improve the state of our environment for our descendants & believe what Deitrich Bonhoeffer is quoted as saying, that - " The ultimate test of a moral society is the kind of world it leaves for it's children."

lenders.name: Victoria
lenders.loan_because: Nothing will ever get better unless people do something to make it better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying to become a teacher!

lenders.occupational_info: i teach university students to think about making the world better

lenders.occupational_info: I design and animate images for film and television.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: As long as I have some money left, it is better to lend it to someone than to just let it grow rusty on a bank account.

lenders.loan_because: I wish to make a difference. If my modest funds can improve the lives of others worldwide, I'm all for it. I hope to be able to lend - lots - as my own small business grows.
lenders.occupational_info: Every person that you meet knows something you do not - learn from them. Help mentor and educate them. I strive to turn on the light bulbs to the magic and exciting aspects of renewable, solar generated electricity. I'm working to promote the rental of solar systems in order to avoid the high upfront purchase expenses. Solar as a service is the way to go.

Thomas has extensive SMB support services experience and is a renowned small business marketing expert.

He holds an MBA from Regis University School of Management; where learners become leaders in the Jesuit tradition.

lenders.name: Hubert
lenders.loan_because: As a teacher for more than eight years one of my taks is to help poor rural and urban disabled children to get a significant learning level. To make this, extra courses and tutoring are offered by a group of friends and I in the houses of the pupils with disabilities. Since the beginning of 2007 we have found a small estate to hold our courses but materials such as tables, benches, boards and 5 computors are still needed. Please Help!!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: We offer special education to children with disabilities in Fada N'Gourma a town where such school does not exist. The courses consist to tutor children who have difficulties to hear or see, who cannot use their fingers accordingly, who suffer mental retardation. After the normal hours of school we meet them in a house in order to help them understand what they were taught in the morning, the evening of the previous day.
